alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 28 at 11:14AM EST until March 01 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. For the Cumberland River...including Cumberland, Baxter, Pineville, Barbourville, Williamsburg...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flooding threatens low lying roads and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.6 feet Saturday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued BY 11 PM.
